| HistoryText             = The High Council of the Shield was the directive ruling council of the [[Brotherhood of the Shield (Earth-616)|Brotherhood of the Shield]], composed by the organization's current Grandmaster and other members.{{r|S.H.I.E.L.D. #1}}

When [[Isaac Newton (Earth-616)|Isaac Newton]] was recruited as a member of the Shield, he was received in the [[Immortal City]], under [[Rome (Italy)|Rome]], by [[Galileo Galilei (Earth-616)|Grandmaster Galileo Galilei]]; he quickly became an important council member, later murdering Galileo and becoming the new Shield's Grandmaster.{{r|S.H.I.E.L.D. #3}}

In 1953, [[Leonid (Earth-616)|Leonid]] was brought to the Immortal City by Shield agents [[Howard Stark (Earth-616)|Stark]] and [[Nathaniel Richards (Earth-616)|Richards]]; there, he was received by Newton and his High Council. Leonid agreed to become a member of the organization, and Newton himself became his tutor.{{r|S.H.I.E.L.D. #1}}
